string-array.name: New_YorkDesc
string-array.item: Travel by both boat (April–December) and bus as you swing by Wall Street, the 9/11 Memorial, South Street Seaport, Rockefeller Center, and much more.
Check two huge sites off your bucket list with this exciting guided 4-hour tour of the Statue of Liberty and Ellis Island.
Dinner cruise that floats around New York Harbor and Manhattan offering stunning views of the city
Straddling the border between Canada and the US, Niagara Falls is a thundering testament to nature’s power, with drops up to 167 (51 meters) high
Get the best view in all of New York City from the Top of the Rock Observation Deck at Rockefeller Plaza.

string-array.name: ChicagoDesc
string-array.item: See more of the Windy City with this money-saving, 2.5-hour, hop-on, hop-off sightseeing bus ticket.
See the towers, piers and iconic landmarks along the Chicago River on an architectural tour through the heart of the city.
Tower above the Windy City’s world-famous skyline with admission to 360 Chicago (John Hancock Observatory).
If you’re visiting Chicago during summer, this Lake Michigan cruise is a family-friendly activity that all ages can enjoy.
Glide around Chicago and along Lake Shore Drive past Lake Michigan on your very own Segway. After a 30-minute orientation session, you’re off to see highlights of the Windy City with an expert guide
